en.title: Former Baseball Star, Bobby Bradley's Testimonial.
en.content: In 1999, I was the first round draft pick for the Pittsburgh Pirates. After playing 7 seasons in professional baseball, I tallied up 5 surgeries, 2 herniated disks, nerve damage, and 14 surgical scars. To say the least, I was beat up and knocked out. I took a year off from any form of competition to let my body recover from the aches and pains. In the middle of 2007, I decided to pick up the sport of Long Drive Golf. I made it to the World Championships but was still feeling terrible after the tournaments. My neck was killing me and my right hand was practically closed caused from nerve damage. I was fortunate enough to meet Lance Reader, the owner of Krank golf and also a Long Drive Professional. He introduced me to the Fusion Excel Quantum Pendant along with a couple of exercises. After all of about 30 seconds, I asked him if this pendant had some form of voodoo . It was amazing how much stronger and flexible I was by putting this in my hands. When I show people the pendant or the bracelet they start laughing and say it's the craziest thing they've ever seen. You don't even need a sales pitch. The pendant does all the selling for you. I wear the pendant everyday and feel totally rejuvenated. The everyday aches and pains are long gone and I've already qualified for the 2008 REMAX World Championships with the FusionExcel Quantum Pendant on my neck.
